subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Fernando Torres scored a second-half goal to give visiting Liverpool a 1-0 victory over Inter Milan and send the Reds to the European Champions League quarterfinals. Liverpool, which won the tournament in 2005 and lost in the final last year, advanced with a 3-0 aggregate after winning, 2-0, at Anfield in the first leg. Inter Milan played the last 40 minutes a man down after defender Nicolas Burdisso was sent off with his second yellow card. After the match, Inter Milan Coach Roberto Mancini said he would resign at the end of the season.Liverpool joins three other English Premier League teams — Chelsea, Manchester United and Arsenal — in the quarterfinals. It is the first time four teams from the same country have made it to the final eight.
